title: scrollback branch tries to allocate 85.33TiB of memory
body:
**Which operating system does the issue occur on?** X11 Linux

**To reproduce:**

```
$ git checkout ec49105
$ cargo build
$ gdb target/debug/alacritty
(gdb) run
// Wait a few seconds
^C
(gdb) bt
```
